titleStmt.title: Sarah and Hagar, or, Genesis the sixteenth chapter opened in XIX sermons / being the first legitimate essay of ... Josias Shute ; published according to his own original manuscripts, circumspectly examined, and faithfully transcribed by Edward Sparke.
titleStmt.author: Shute, Josias, 1588-1643.
Sparke, Edward, d. 1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.L. and Humphrey Moseley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
